Docs.summary: Check the availability of a resource name. This API should be used to check the uniqueness of the name for support ticket creation for the selected subscription. Request Path: /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/providers/Microsoft.Support/checkNameAvailability Operation Id: SupportTickets_CheckNameAvailability
